metadata.description:
The four realms have fallen and an age of darkness has 
arrived. The Dark Queen begins her reign while the survivors, still 
reeling from such a terrifying display of power, must band together in 
order to defeat her and restore order. But with several Realm Knights 
dead and the Grimm Universe thrown into chaos, can Sela and her 
remaining team stand against the Dark Queen and her army?
metadata.name: Realm War
